channel.title: [REP++] Item is nulled in combat tab?[PI]
channel.description:
Im using 9119 (null) as a code for one of my custom items, I have it renamed to "dual axes" everywhere, but then in my combat tab it shows its a null. How can I change this to "Dual Axes"
[img]http://puu.sh/eOeY[/img]
PI base too

item.title: [REP++] Item is nulled in combat tab?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Weasey Weasey
item.description:
@Weasey wrote:

whackatre:

Did you update the name on item.cfg?

Well… i’m retarded.

Read full topic

item.title: [REP++] Item is nulled in combat tab?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Reverse_Hate Reverse Hate
item.description:
@Reverse_Hate wrote:

PROJECT INSANITY
~–—~----~~~~
IDK For Sure If This Works. So If you made the custom you should know how to do this better than me.

Go To Itemdef.java and search like “torva” And then add this case 13360: //Dunno. itemDef.modelid = 62701; //Model Id itemDef.name = "Torva platelegs"; //Name itemDef.description = "Torva platelegs."; //Description itemDef.modelZoom = 1740; itemDef.modelRotationY = 474; itemDef.modelRotationX = 2045; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -5; itemDef.anInt165 = 62743; itemDef.anInt200 = 62760; itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; //option 1 itemDef.itemActions[2] = "Check-charges"; //option 2 itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop"; //option 4 break;
Somewhere in there it tells where to put like necklace, ring, or shield. To Lazy To Sort Through The 2 Mins It Will Take >.> Sorry. Got A Headache. Hopefully Your Self Sufficient Enough To Figure This Out.

Read full topic
